remarks: Strong (or "total") induction principle over an upper set of integers. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 16-May-2014.)
statement:
uzsinds.1 $e |- ( x = y -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
uzsinds.2 $e |- ( x = N -> ( ph <-> ch ) ) $.
uzsinds.3 $e |- ( x e. ( ZZ>= ` M ) -> ( A. y e. ( M ... ( x - 1 ) ) ps -> ph ) ) $.
uzsinds $p |- ( N e. ( ZZ>= ` M ) -> ch ) $.
$d M x $.
$d M x y $.
$d N x $.
$d ch x $.
$d ph y $.
$d ps x $.
